column4: I'm going nuts..trying to transfer some files from my old lappy that is pretty muched effed up...
I can't burn a dvd...and I can't get files onto either flash drive (error reading from file: input/output error)
is there any kind of quick fix to get around this?
you can buy a USB enclosure for your hardrive take your hard drive out your machine and hook it up to your current pc via usb
